title: Convert a $3.88 Walmart Clock into a Smart Wi-Fi Clock

topic: Converting a $3.88 analog clock from Walmart into a ESP8266-based Wi-Fi clock

title: Why Is the Sky Blue? The Science Explained Simply

title: Discord ID Verification: Face Scan or ID Required in 2024

topic: Discord will require a face scan or ID for full access next month
